title: Client randomly crashing occasionally
body: My client just randomly crashed during champion select; also, the client also decides to crash on the hextech crafting tab whenever i click it sometimes.

replies.body:
As *Rineyy* mentioned, running windows updates can potentially help, due to a recent set of windows updates that were causing some hextech crafting crashes that have since been resolved with the [newest updates](http://www.update.microsoft.com/). 

Crashing in champ select, though, it usually caused by an unstable connection to the servers, and the guide that *Rineyy* linked is a good place to start in troubleshooting this. 

If you continue to see these issues after taking those steps, please let me know.

Disconnects in Champ Select are usually due to an unstable connection with the LoL servers. Champ Select in all modes require a steady connection to prevent crashing.

Crashes in the Hextech Hub is likely due to the same cause but for Hextech in particular, ensure you have the latest Windows updates.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
